item.title: Setting up this blog
item.description: Hugo Set up locally https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ Add content blog posts static page list pages Customize theme Picking theme There are hundreds of themes available on the hugo site. At first, I picked hyde to start with, I like the simplistic two-column design. Hyde is originally a Jekyll theme, it was ported by the creator of Hugo @spf13. As one of the most basic and popular theme, I think it would be a good theme to begin with.
